description: The peer-reviewed study in the American Journal of Obstetrics and Gynecology says a pregnancy checkbox on national death certificates inflates the death rate.
title: How bad is maternal mortality in the U.S.? A new study says it's been overestimated

description: Adelle Waldman's novel is a workplace ensemble set in a Costco-like store. But, because Help Wanted is a group portrait, it tends to visit, rather than settle in with, its working class characters.
title: Big-box store workers find themselves shut out of the American Dream in 'Help Wanted'

description: Oil and gas drillers are releasing more climate-warming methane than the government estimates, a new study shows.
title: Oil and gas companies emit more climate-warming methane than EPA reports

description: David E. Harris became the first Black pilot to fly for a commercial airline when American Airlines hired him in 1964. Announcing Capt. Harris' death, American's CEO called him a "trailblazer."
title: The first Black pilot of a commercial airline has died at 89

description: The judge overseeing the Georgia racketeering case against Donald Trump and his allies has quashed a number of charges related to soliciting officials to violate their oaths of office.
title: Judge in Georgia election interference case quashes some charges against Trump
